# Vaults Report

> Open, community-curated effort to map the protocols, managers, and tooling powering vault infrastructure and onchain asset management.

Website: https://vaults.report
Twitter: https://x.com/vaultsreport
Publisher: GLAM *.+

## Overview

Vaults Report is a community-curated resource providing taxonomy, evaluation frameworks, and a directory of 100+ vault protocols in the DeFi ecosystem.

## Sections

- Map: Visual ecosystem landscape
- Directory: Searchable database of 100+ protocols
- Learn: Educational content on vault infrastructure
- Resources: Additional materials

## Key Concepts

- **Vault**: Smart contract that pools capital and deploys it according to defined logic
- **Archetypes**: Wrapper, Modular, Aggregator
- **Execution Models**: Automated, Curated, Managed
- **Two Levels of Trust**: Protocol-level vs Vault-level risk

## Categories

- Infrastructure (Vault Platforms, Cross-Chain, Protocol-Native)
- Management & Curation
- Lending & Yield
- Asset Tokenization
- Tooling
